#labels Featured,Plot,GameDesign
Ignacio is a fire wizard, a proficient smith, and a member of the [CouncilOfElders Council of Elders]. Conspirators within the council steal the [BookOfFire Book of Fire] and banish him. He is approached by the [CrimsonOrder Crimson Order], an ancient secret society based in the [Catacombs catacombs]. Assuming the name of Mortimer, Ignacio must now master the forbidden art of [Necromancy necromancy] as a means to unveiling the conspiracy.
